comment._content: Det ser ut som Nassauer haus, på Lorenzerplatz

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Du har helt rätt! / You're quite right! 

The house is called Nassauer Haus, situated at Lorenzer Platz.
And the fountain is called Tugendbrunnen - Fountain of the Virtues. 

Thanks a lot for identifying so fast! I'll add the information. 

/Anna B.

comment.author: 25585538@N06
comment._content: Nürnberg, Karolinenstraße 2, Nassauerhaus. Blickrichtung West vom Lorenzer Platz
